author: CBR
description:
In this Heroes Journey clip, Sierra and Sean break down why Clayface is one of the most exciting upcoming DCU projects. 

They talk about Mike Flanagan writing the script, the horror tone inspired by Batman: The Animated Series, the release date, and whether this Clayface film will feel like a true DC horror movie or an Elseworlds-style side story.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 8.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/SlDy2W1naTY
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg
